
{{Server function}}
This function returns a random [[/player.md|player]].

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
player getRandomPlayer ( )
</syntaxhighlight>
{{OOP||[[/Player.md|Player]].getRandom}}
===Returns===
Returns a random [[/player.md|player]], ''false'' if the server is empty.

==Example==
This code outputs a random player's name.
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
local randomPlayer = getRandomPlayer ( )
outputChatBox ( getPlayerName ( randomPlayer ).." is now the fugitive!" )
</syntaxhighlight>
